alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 7:18AM MST until January 19 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches and total ice accumulation of up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Craigmont, Winchester, Soldiers Meadow Road, Kamiah, and Nezperce. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and walking surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to transition to freezing rain between 9 PM and Midnight tonight. Temperatures are expected to warm above freezing Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
